title: Proceedings to review
context: ยง157-25 Proceedings to review. The action of the board of agriculture in refusing to grant or renew a license, or in revoking or suspending a license, or in conditioning or limiting the granting or renewal of a license, may be reviewed in the manner provided by chapter 91. [L 1967, c 260, ยง16; HRS ยง157-25]
